attributes.action: We petition the government to prevent the Dairy Farmers of the UK from hijacking March 1st as National Dairy Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the government to prevent the Dairy Farmers of the UK from hijacking March 1st as National Dairy Day. It is already St David's day in Wales and is celebrated widely. Why not not use St George's day instead, which is a non event?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
